description: Maps Slack channel IDs to Zendesk configuration and forms

allowed_channels.description: This channel will be used for customer issues dealing with membership and billing for all car wash locations.
Customer requests for the Central Texas washes

notes: Each channel is assigned a form_key that references a form in form_mappings.json. Replace channel_id values with your actual Slack channel IDs. Find them by right-clicking a channel -> View channel details -> Copy ID (at bottom)
